title: Looking to buy/trade for lower grade EPDGs
author: 53toppscollector

posts.post_title: Looking to buy/trade for lower grade EPDGs
posts.post_content:
Hi. 

I would like to buy your lower grade EPDGs that you may be looking to part with.

* I'm generally fine with issues on the front of the card, I'd like to avoid holes in the card if possible
* I'm looking for nicer backs without paper loss on the actual red printing, if possible, but a small imperfection won't be a dealbreaker
* If I have the subject with a different back, I'd be willing to trade/add cash to equal it out, if you are interested in just downgrading (or in a few cases, upgrading) to a different back. I'm happy to just pay cash too. 

I only have a handful of EPDG backs, so this is the beginning of my quest. I'm generally going to avoid graded copies due to cost consideration, but if you have a really nice A or a 1 or 2 with good eye appeal at a reasonable cost, that works too. 

Thanks
